name: Rocket Riddles
description:
Rocket Riddles is a retro platformer where you use rocket launchers to solve puzzles. 

The game features 27 levels and can be played with keyboard or gamepad.

Warning: The youtube video spoils the solution to the first 14 levels.

This game was made during FZ Game Jam 2020, that used these keywords:

  • Rocket launcher
  • Moon
  • Calle
